sentences.english: I dreamed that I was inside a hospital room. I was wearing a hospital gown and I was sitting at the foot of my bed.

sentences.english: The disease changed him from an athlete into an invalid.

sentences.english: The early voting involves hundreds of thousands of government employees, the sick and prisoners.

sentences.english: My two hospital gowns were less than formal, but I didn't care.
sentences.chinese: 我穿着兩件病號服，實在太不正式，但我不在乎。

sentences.english: Status Offline 1. Apparently this site has an actual doctor giving out advice…

sentences.english: the daily military formation at which individuals report to the medical officer as sick.
